head.title: Insert Tables into {{FileFormatUp}} Documents with {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to quickly embed tables in documents or emails, pulling data from various sources.

header.title: Effortlessly Add Tables to {{FileFormatUp}} Files with {{EnvNameShort}}
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, filling tables in {{FileFormatUp}} documents is simple, using data from multiple sources.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Introduction to {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful tool for automating document creation. It lets you easily insert tables, charts, lists, and images into templates, with precise content placement. Supporting over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, and email, it streamlines report generation and other tasks.

more_features.title: Easily Add Data-Driven Tables to Documents
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} allows users to create tables automatically, while also embedding charts, images, and lists using template-based workflows.

feature_1.title: Generate Tables from Structured Data
feature_1.content: Fetch data from JSON, XML, CSV, and other formats to automatically populate document tables.

feature_2.title: Create Polished Visual Content
feature_2.content: Use {{ProdShortName}} to design professional tables, charts, and lists, and to add links, images, and text for a refined document appearance.

feature_3.title: Dynamic Table Content Placement
feature_3.content: Add rows and columns programmatically using LINQ-based templates, and customize styles like fonts, colors, and alignment.

feature_4.title: Works Seamlessly Across Formats
feature_4.content: Easily create or edit tables in MS Office, OpenOffice, PDF, HTML, and other formats, merging them into files as needed.

formats.title: Generate Tables in a Variety of Formats
formats.description: With {{EnvName}}, populate templates and create comprehensive tables across more than 50 supported file types.

operations.title: Core Features at a Glance
operations.description: Our API automates table creation and enhances document generation with versatile tools and templates.

examples.comment_1: Include these tags in the table row placeholders of your template
examples.comment_3: Load your data from a chosen source
examples.comment_4: Save the final document with the completed table

steps.title: How to Add Data to a Table in {{FileFormatUp}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) enables you to quickly populate table templates for {{FileFormatUp}} files using dynamic data sources.
content.step_1: Create a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for table rows and columns.
content.step_2: Load data from a supported source like JSON or CSV.
content.step_3: Organize and format the data as needed.
content.step_4: Generate the document with the completed table.

code_1.title: How to Programmatically Populate a Table
code_1.content: This example demonstrates filling a table in a {{FileFormatUp}} document with data from an external source.
code_1.comment_1: Design a template with placeholders for the table
code_1.comment_2: Specify the file path to the template
code_1.comment_3: Load the required data from your source
code_1.comment_4: Organize the data into the necessary structure
code_1.comment_6: Save the output document with the completed table

texts_pdf.step_1: Create a template with placeholders for the table (PDF templates are not currently supported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Export the document with the filled table as a PDF file.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: PDF templates are not supported at this time.
